statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 5 \\ 0 \\ 35 \\ 20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -24 \\ 8 \\ 0 \\ 56 \\ 32 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
